name: Tree of Life UPC (Church - Not Substance Abuse Treatment)
description: This resource was incorrectly categorized as a substance abuse treatment center. Research shows this is actually Tree of Life UPC, a United Pentecostal Church International congregation located in East Bernstadt, Kentucky. It is a religious organization providing worship services and spiritual guidance, not mental health or substance abuse treatment services.
source: Verified from MapQuest, official UPCI website, and multiple online directories
notes: This resource was incorrectly categorized as a substance abuse treatment center. It is actually a church providing religious services and spiritual guidance. The phone number in the original record (606-657-1447) does not match the verified church phone number (606-843-6461). This resource should be removed from the substance abuse treatment category or marked as invalid for this purpose.
verification_notes: Research confirmed this is a church, not a substance abuse treatment center. The organization provides religious services and spiritual guidance, not mental health or addiction treatment services. The phone number discrepancy also indicates potential data quality issues.
